text: Two elderly ladies, with the help of a few dedicated volunteers, toiled for years to transform an abandoned PUB lot into a lush, peaceful haven for the surrounding residents. Towering trees and blooming shrubs cast cooling shade and infuse the garden with vibrant splashes of colour, while the thick greenery gives the garden a serene, tropical feel. Worn pathways weave through the space, adding to its rustic charm. Along the way, you might even stumble upon many plants reminiscent of a bygone kampong era, almost forgotten in the modern time.
